pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Tor Browser Launcher is a program to help you download, update, and run the Tor Browser Bundle. It handles downloading Tor Browser from https://www.torproject.org/, extracting it to where you want it, adding a menu entry, and launching it. It will even verify the GnuPG signature of the Tor Browser Bundle.
This application provides a simple GUI built with PySide6 (Qt6) to manage your Tor Browser installation securely. It verifies GPG signatures of downloads and optionally updates over Tor for maximum security.
